meanings.definition: A unit of electromotive force equal to one hundred millionth of a volt.
meanings.sent1: An abvolt is a tiny amount of electrical force.
meanings.sent2: Scientists measure very small electrical charges in abvolts.
meanings.sent3: When the abvolt met the volt, they had a shocking encounter!
meanings.sent4: The abvolt whispered to the volt, creating a spark of energy between them.
meanings.sent5: The abvolt danced around the circuit, lighting up the path with its minuscule power.

meanings.definition: A unit of electromotive force equal to one hundred millionth of a volt.
meanings.sent1: Tiny devices require only a fraction of an abvolt to operate.
meanings.sent2: The abvolt measurement helps engineers design efficient electronic systems.
meanings.sent3: The abvolt and the volt played hide and seek in the electrical circuit.
meanings.sent4: In the world of electricity, the abvolt is the tiniest superhero.
meanings.sent5: The abvolt hummed softly, energizing the circuit with its subtle power.
